text:
@HillaryClinton S. Korea counted actual Coronavirus deaths. US counted all deaths. S.K. didn't send elderly virus patients into nursing homes causing it to spread.
S.K. has 51 million ppl, US has 330 million. Your friend, Farsi gave bad advise. Pelosi told everyone to go out. Should I go on?
